text: Sundari Neeyum Sundaran Njanum is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thulasidas, starring Mukesh and Ranjitha in the lead roles. It was one of the biggest hit in the year 1995.http://www.nthwall.com/ml/movie/Sundari-Neeyum- Sundaran-Njanum-1995/9465401465 ==Cast== *Mukesh as Balakrishnan *Ranjitha as Radha *Anju Aravind as Indu * Thilakan as Achuthan Nair *Saikumar as Mahadevan *Chippy as Shobha *Janardhanan as Parameswaran Nair *Kanakalatha as Subhadra Nair * Nedumudi Venu as Prabhakara Menon * Premkumar as Vikraman Nair * Indrans as Sarassan Nair *Paravoor Bharathan *Shanthakumari *Zainuddin * KPAC Lalitha ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Thulasidas
title: Sundari Neeyum Sundaran Njanum
